        public Armor(int price,
             int minimumLevel,

        Constructor of Armor calss. This is the constructor of Armor class. It sets the armor's base deffense and calls Item constructor (it's super class).
        Parameters:
        price - Price of the item.
        minimumLevel - Minimum level required to use the item. //@param quality Quality of the item.
        name - Name of the item.
        baseDeffense - Base damage of the Weapon.
